description.english: Beat the easy campaign in one sitting without dying or restarting once
Beat par on an easy level
Match par on all easy levels
Hit the side of a spike block in the easy campaign
Beat 5 medium levels without sacrificing yourself to a giant chess piece
Beat 15 medium levels without choking on gold
Beat 25 medium levels, because you levio-saw the solutions
Beat the medium campaign in one sitting without dying or restarting once
Beat par on a medium level
Break all cracked blocks in the map "Texas"
Get trapped in a 1x1 area with a locked goal in a medium level
Beat the hard campaign in one sitting without dying or restarting once
Beat par on a hard level
Match par on 15 hard levels. The actual air-speed velocity doesn't matter, but neither should be fed rice
Match par on 20 hard levels. Do you see the violence inherent in the system?
Match par on all hard levels. We can't take you like that, it's against regulation
Break all cracked blocks in the map "Dystopia"
Die on a samaritan killer block after passing through a pointer block
Replay a level to improve your move count
Beat a level of your own creation
Beat all three campaigns. Make your engineers invent a combustible lemon that burns life's house down

displayName.english: Walked a Mile in Our Shoes

description.english: Travel a total of 5280 blocks. I guarantee this took you longer than four minutes
Travel 30 blocks before you stop moving
Die 9 times. You have no idea how lucky you are. Even cats only have nine lives
Die 2000 times. At this point, you can consider yourself well and truly dead
Sacrifice yourself to the god of spikes
Pass by without stopping to help
Die 30+ times on the same map
Die after surviving for at least 100 moves
Collect the last coin immediately after leaving a locked goal tile
Solidify more ghost blocks than the time it takes to beat the map (in seconds)

displayName.english: The Ghost of Christmas Yet to Come

description.english: Solidify 16 ghost blocks before you stop moving
Stop moving after passing through 10 or more pointer blocks
Match par in the easy campaign in one sitting without dying or restarting once
Match par in the medium campaign in one sitting without dying or restarting once
Match par in the hard campaign in one sitting without dying or restarting once
Die before making your first move

displayName.english: This is a rebellion, isn't it?

description.english: Copy a level code to send to a friend
Paste a level code and begin editing the level
